query:
SELECT
                c.id,
                c.name,
                c.description,
                c.image,
                EXISTS (
                    SELECT 1 FROM community_user cu
                    WHERE cu.community_id = c.id
                    AND cu.user_id = $1
                ) as "is_present!"
            FROM community c
            WHERE EXISTS (
                SELECT 1 FROM energy_record er
                WHERE er.community_id = c.id
                AND er.user_id = $1
            )
